Edmond.KOCM: KOCM, virtual channel and UHF digital channel 46, is a Daystar owned-and-operated television station serving Oklahoma City, Oklahoma, United States that is licensed to Norman. The station is owned by the Daystar subsidiary Word of God Fellowship, Inc. KOCM maintains offices and master control facilities located on 72nd Avenue Northeast in Norman, and its transmitter is located near the John Kilpatrick Turnpike/I-44 in northeast Oklahoma City.
